Text: Congratulations to the @USWNT for FINALLY securing #EqualPay and getting the back pay they earned! One of the most accomplished women's teams shouldn't have had to fight six years to get the equal pay they deserved ‚Äî but I know their fight has inspired a generation of players. https://t.co/3B1uNXBUDM

During #BlackHistoryMonth we celebrate the leaders who broke barriers & changed the face of government. But this year, we can also make history.

There's never been a Black woman governor in the United States. Let's change that by electing @staceyabrams. https://t.co/ctM6QXWjW7

Legalizing cannabis and expunging non-violent convictions isn't just a criminal justice issue ‚Äî it's a health and economic issue too. I'm fighting alongside @CPeoplesStokes to ensure communities which were disproportionately harmed are able to benefit from this growing industry. https://t.co/sj7mfG0BBY

Public officials must hold ourselves to a higher standard. That's why the STOCK Act 2.0 I introduced with @KatiePorterOC bans not just members of Congress but also the president and vice president, SCOTUS justices, and top Federal Reserve officials from trading individual stocks. https://t.co/2gl4PXh5V8

I was so proud to join @CPeoplesStokes for the launch of @equitypacny! Legalizing cannabis is a criminal justice, health care, and economic issue. I‚Äôm proud to support her bold vision and to fight on the federal level to legalize cannabis and expunge non-violent convictions. https://t.co/u2z8oYBKQI
I'll be on #PoliticsNation with @TheRevAl soon ‚Äî tune in!
New York's future is looking bright! https://t.co/W6AoVDPQLi
Trust me, you always want @TishJames by your side! https://t.co/s2jGOP2M00
Proud to call @KathyHochul our governor, and ready to elect her for a full term serving the people of New York! https://t.co/qByJ2xNaEY

Millions of workers missed work during this latest COVID surge. Many lost paychecks ‚Äî some probably lost their jobs. Now their families are struggling to make ends meet. They need emergency #PaidLeave NOW. https://t.co/8uv8m64Otu

Bad employers used forced arbitration agreements to hide misconduct and silence survivors of sexual assault and harassment. Thanks to the #EndForcedArbitration Act Congress passed last week, survivors can finally have their day in court. https://t.co/Fy6WXXNucN
Happy Valentine's Day, Jonnie. Love you always. ‚ù§Ô∏è https://t.co/ERV7JgoVt3
I'm so proud to announce that I'm endorsing my friend @KathyHochul for a full term serving the people of New York as governor! https://t.co/pAKlflsHzt

Members of Congress should be looking out for YOUR best interests, not their own. @katieporteroc and I reintroduced STOCK Act 2.0 to:
‚ùå Ban lawmakers from trading individual stocks
üîç Require them and their families to report any loan, contract, or government benefit they get https://t.co/zsASt1o9Xn

I'm so proud to endorse my friend @TishJames for reelection as New York's attorney general! She's a tireless fighter who always does what it takes to defend our fundamental rights and stand up for New York families. We need her courage now more than ever! https://t.co/ZYRo9ZVxyw

Whether it's a member of Congress, a Supreme Court Justice, or a President or Vice President, you should be able to trust that public officials are looking out for your best interests ‚Äî not their own bottom line. We need to pass the STOCK Act 2.0. https://t.co/E3m85E1ZpU

The movement that started in Buffalo is spreading throughout New York and across the country! I'm so proud I could meet workers on the ground at the start and see this movement grow. https://t.co/5uLkEQbgh8

Today the Senate passed my bill to #EndForcedArbitration, fixing a broken system that protected perpetrators and corporations and silenced survivors of sexual assault and harassment. This is one of the most historic workplace reforms in a generation. https://t.co/6umRM7a5rN
Workers need the #PROAct NOW. https://t.co/YiYGUNSHVT

If we had already passed #PaidLeaveForAll, millions of families might not be struggling to make ends meet right now. They can't keep waiting while Congress kicks the can down the road. Families need #PaidLeave now. https://t.co/vI50kuhnJL

The House just passed my bill to #EndForcedArbitration ‚Äî one of the most significant workplace reforms in American history. It's time for the Senate to pass this bill and put an end to secretive, one-sided proceedings that let corporations hide misconduct and silence survivors.

If Mitch McConnell can eliminate the filibuster to ram through Supreme Court justices who will gut the Voting Rights Act, we can't let the filibuster stop us from passing the John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act and defending our voice at the ballot box. #JLVRAA

Let's be clear: The Supreme Court is allowing a blatant violation of the Voting Rights Act, diminishing the power of Black voters in Alabama, using its shadow docket without a full hearing. It's a disturbing sign that the full #VRA is at risk. https://t.co/bttgggb1oA

Nine years ago, I introduced the #FAMILYAct with @Rosa_DeLauro. It's been a long, hard road since then ‚Äî but I'm willing to fight as long as it takes until we get the job done and finally pass universal, guaranteed #PaidLeave. https://t.co/XnKE0EMfuG

The Family and Medical Leave Act may protect some of us from losing our jobs if we're sick or need to care for a loved one, but millions of workers can't afford to miss even one paycheck. It's time to join the rest of the world and finally pass universal, guaranteed #PaidLeave.

The #FMLA is 29 years old today. We had nearly three decades to pass universal guaranteed #PaidLeave, which could have saved millions of women's jobs during this pandemic. And without child care and #PaidLeave, women are STILL struggling to get back to work. https://t.co/3NDNLJRwgD

The 15th Amendment was ratified on this day in 1870, but it would take nearly 100 years for abolitionists, suffragists, and civil rights activists to tear down the barriers that kept Black men and women from voting. Now it's on us to protect the right they risked their lives for. https://t.co/Fx3pmt4LT7
@amyklobuchar @SenatorRounds Thank you my friend! It was wonderful to have you there with us.

You can't spend #BlackHistoryMonth celebrating the lives and legacies of Black activists, leaders, and marchers who fought for civil rights if you're not willing to stand up now to defend the right to vote.

During #BlackHistoryMonth we celebrate the incredible Black Americans who have shaped our nation. But we can't just celebrate the legacies of those leaders ‚Äî we have to keep working every single day to defend the progress they made, and continue fighting for justice and equality.
Happy Lunar New Year to everyone celebrating the Year of the Tiger! üêØüßß

Some parents who quit their jobs to care for their kids during the pandemic were back at work‚Äîthen omicron upended everything. We can't keep forcing parents through this gauntlet over and over again. We need to invest in child care, and we need #PaidLeave. https://t.co/6GS3z05RAF

Millions of parents had already been forced to leave their jobs during the pandemic to care for their kids. Now the latest surge is forcing even more to make an impossible choice between caring for their kids or paying the bills. Parents need #PaidLeave. https://t.co/hST7CPY3oX

Someone seeking help in a crisis shouldn't have to worry about their data being sold for a giant corporation's profit. If we passed the Data Protection Act, this would be illegal‚Äîand we would have a dedicated agency with the muscle and expertise to protect your data and privacy. https://t.co/KDklPUSipt

Unions are more popular than ever ‚Äî but as soon as workers try to organize, they face unrelenting, union-busting scare tactics. We need to pass the #PROAct to protect and strengthen our unions so they can keep fighting for working families. https://t.co/00Eejd7j8O

Thanks to your hard work, Democrats secured the Senate majority, and we'll confirm a new Supreme Court justice who will protect our civil rights. But with so much at stake, we must defend and expand our Senate majority this year. Chip in now: https://t.co/CWLWFwP8Ej https://t.co/54B0R09Wne
If our voting rights are being undermined, we can‚Äôt protect our reproductive rights. https://t.co/K8b57qIk2T

Mitch McConnell eliminated the filibuster to ram through Trump's extreme, right-wing Supreme Court justices who might overturn #RoeVWade. We can't let the filibuster stop us from passing the Women's Health Protection Act and defending our reproductive freedom.

Today marks the 49th anniversary of #RoeVWade. If Trump-appointed right-wing justices get their way, it may be its last. We need to pass the Women's Health Protection Act to codify Roe and protect our reproductive freedom.

How can we have a government by the people and for the people when Citizens United allows a wealthy few to flood our elections with billions of dollars? We need to get big money out of politics, root out corruption, and put power back in the hands of the people. https://t.co/2MCaKz1Onl

The right to vote is sacred ‚Äî the filibuster is not. We have a moral responsibility to defend our democracy. We didn't have the votes to overcome the filibuster today, but the arc of the moral universe is long. And I will keep fighting until it bends toward justice.
Wordle of Wisdom 3/6 #VotingRightsNow https://t.co/72F1MOvyx5

Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. and thousands of Americans like him risked their lives to fight for the right to vote. I won't let the filibuster stop me from defending that sacred right. #MLKDay https://t.co/k1xg73WJp7
The filibuster isn't a constitutional right or a pillar of our democracy ‚Äî but the right to vote is. https://t.co/fhGVhlluj1

I'm fighting to defend everyone's right to vote ‚Äî whether you're voting for my party or not. But as I made clear in my @foxnews op-ed today, I'm not going to let the filibuster stand in our way. https://t.co/MdY0DV3kzN

Protecting the right to vote shouldn't be a partisan issue. But when the same people pushing baseless claims of stolen elections want to make voting even harder, I'll do everything I can to defend your right. And I won't let the filibuster stand in my way. https://t.co/MdY0DV3kzN
When unions win, workers win. Congrats to @SBWorkersUnited! https://t.co/v5NB6npkl2

Americans need to be able to trust that our public officials aren't acting in their own self-interest. We need to pass the Ban Conflicted Trading at the Fed Act to ban Federal Reserve officials from trading individual stocks. https://t.co/vROkSIQBBh

Omicron is more contagious ‚Äî but if you're vaccinated and boosted, you are far less likely to get seriously ill and need hospital care.

Protect yourself and help ease the strain on hospitals and health care workers. Get vaccinated and boosted. https://t.co/R3qintAFXz https://t.co/HYqUGJvIBN

Kids 12 and older who got their second Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine before August, 2021 are now eligible to get their boosters! Both my boys got their boosters, and I hope you'll boost your kids too. It's the best way to protect them and help keep all of our kids in school.

Watching @GabbyGiffords' recovery these past eleven years has been nothing short of remarkable. Every single day, I'm amazed by her tenacity and determination to keep pushing forward and to keep fighting to end the gun violence epidemic. Gabby, I'm so lucky to call you my friend. https://t.co/suuOVf05eD

I did not let a violent insurrection stop me from doing my constitutional duty to certify a free and fair election. I will not let the filibuster stop me from doing my duty to defend the sacred right to vote. https://t.co/KKvM8fQdGk

But our work doesn‚Äôt end there. Those who are determined to undermine our democracy are still hard at work pushing the Big Lie and using it to justify an unprecedented wave of voter suppression bills. https://t.co/Ga430UBlJD

I keep these text messages as a reminder of what it felt like to live through that day ‚Äî not just to remember my own fear and frustration, but to remember how terrifying it was for the people who loved me to watch the violence unfold live on TV and worry over my safety. https://t.co/sa3EvZGHSG
Last year I wrote for @nytopinion about what it was like in the Capitol on January 6th. Today, I want to share with you some of the text messages I've saved from that day. https://t.co/0dOyaag04c

Look at what Erin Scanlon and Lindsey Knapp endured and tell me: Does that seem like a fair, independent, and impartial justice system? We need to FULLY remove the prosecution of serious crimes from the chain of command. #PassMJIIPA https://t.co/IQZVf7ZC5U

Hospitals and health care workers are already exhausted after fighting this pandemic for two years. Please, please, please: Get vaccinated. Get boosted. And wear a mask and get tested. It's the best way to protect yourself from getting seriously ill. https://t.co/8bsSIkrCeV
Well, at least someone's enjoying all this snow!¬†‚ùÑÔ∏è https://t.co/HPQpcIGRG5

This has been a tough year, and we've still got big problems to tackle in the year ahead. But I'm still an optimist, because I know we're ready to roll up our sleeves, get to work, & make next year even brighter. From my family to yours, wishing you all a happy, healthy new year!

Get vaccinated.
Get boosted.
Get tested.
Protect yourself and your loved ones. https://t.co/6aOlgMkSZw

To all the moms who've been working so hard to look after your kids this year ‚Äî pulling together child care, carpools, staying home longer than you expected ‚Äî I want you to know that I'm so proud of you. And we're going to fight to get you affordable child care and #PaidLeave. https://t.co/rCTtvs71BS

Americans like John Lewis have risked their lives to fight for the right to vote. I won't dishonor their courage and sacrifice by letting something as small as the filibuster stand in the way of passing the John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act. #JLVRAA https://t.co/BdABzMxdyl

From my family to yours, wishing you all a very merry Christmas! Mom and I made Grandpa Noonan's Date Balls today, here's the recipe if you want to give it a try! What's your family's favorite Christmas recipe? https://t.co/MwHQxFn0dd
Get vaccinated. Get boosted. And get tested. It's the best way to protect you and your loved ones from getting seriously ill from COVID-19. https://t.co/6aOlgMkSZw

Right now there are families who are being forced to choose between getting their kids Christmas presents or paying for their insulin. They don't know if they'll be able to afford their next heating bill, or child care. They need us to pass the #BuildBackBetter Act.

More abortion restrictions have been passed this year than in any other year since #RoeVWade was decided.

Our reproductive freedom is under attack. We need to pass the #WHPA to codify Roe and stop states from banning abortion.

I've already spent nearly ten years fighting for #PaidLeave. So believe me when I say that I'm willing to talk to anyone and everyone, answer every single question, and fight for however long it takes until we get it done.

This crisis isn't over for working families. They're relying on the #ChildTaxCredit to feed their kids and pay their bills. They need affordable child care, pre-k, & caregivers to get back to work. And they need #PaidLeave. I won't stop fighting to pass the #BuildBackBetter Act.
Congratulations, @ossoff! I'm so happy for you and Alisha, and I can't wait to meet Baby Eva! https://t.co/kuOpHROsVl

Voting rights. Climate change. Gun violence. Reproductive rights. On just about every issue that Americans are demanding action on, the filibuster is standing in our way. The stakes are too high. It's time to stop letting our democracy be held hostage by the filibuster.
Get vaccinated. Get boosted. https://t.co/6aOlgMCuo6
https://t.co/nZPKzgzxRk https://t.co/b1Bl4yapB3
At some point in your life, you'll probably need paid leave, too. Families can't keep waiting on Congress. We need to pass #PaidLeave in the #BuildBackBetter Act. https://t.co/m2rz1XV2Tn

The Supreme Court allowed Texas to enforce its extreme abortion ban, and Justice Sonia Sotomayor is sounding the alarm about the extreme right-wing majority's refusal to defend our constitutional rights. We need to pass the #WHPA to defend our reproductive freedom. https://t.co/UspbQIC5hE

If Mitch McConnell can eliminate the filibuster to install Supreme Court justices who might overturn #RoeVWade, we can't let the filibuster stand in the way of passing the Women's Health Protection Act and defending our reproductive freedom.

Happy birthday to my birthday twin, @staceyabrams! üéÇ

If you want to give us both a gift today, chip in to help elect her as the next governor of Georgia! https://t.co/ctM6QXVM6z https://t.co/XuvOafXEIy

Four men behind closed doors gutted our landmark military justice reform bill in the NDAA ‚Äî ignoring the calls of survivors, service members, and veterans. Enough is enough. Our bill has the support of a majority of Congress. I'm calling for a full floor vote to #PassMJIIPA.

Unions help level the playing field for working families ‚Äî which is why some companies fight so hard to keep their employees from joining one. The #PROAct would put a stop to their intimidation and scare tactics. Thanks to @SBWorkersUnited for sharing their stories with me. https://t.co/wRmlOdTWHp

We've spent nearly a decade building a bipartisan, filibuster-proof coalition to reform the military justice system. It's absurd to me that four men‚Äîin a back room with the door closed‚Äîcould try to subvert the will of so many other members to deny justice. https://t.co/5G1vGf2I5w

You deserve the right to control your own body and to decide when you will be pregnant and become a parent. And you deserve a country that makes it possible to raise a family and give your children the best life possible. We must defend our reproductive freedom.

And 60% of women who get abortions are already mothers. Many of them desperately want another kid ‚Äî but they can't. Because they don't have health care. Or #PaidLeave to give birth and care for a newborn. Or affordable child care. Or a livable wage to get everything a baby needs.

Where do I even begin with this?

The United States has one of the highest maternal and infant mortality rates of all developed nations. Forcing a woman to go through pregnancy puts her life and health at risk ‚Äî especially for women of color.
https://t.co/VlR0hHk3ee

I'm so proud to endorse my friend @StaceyAbrams! She's been a fearless champion for Georgia families and has fought relentlessly to protect the right to vote. She's exactly the type of leader we need right now. Donate to give her campaign a strong start: https://t.co/ctM6QXVM6z

Mississippi asked the Supreme Court to overturn #RoeVWade, and if they succeed, millions of Americans across the country could be denied their constitutional right to abortion. We need to pass the Women's Health Protection Act to defend our reproductive freedom. https://t.co/cJATMsvyAx

The right to a safe, legal abortion is on the line at the Supreme Court today.

Our fundamental human rights should not be up for debate. #AbortionIsEssential ‚Äî and we will do everything in our power to defend it.

This moment from @lisaling's #ThisIsLife shows just how badly our military justice system is failing our service members. If we want justice for survivors of military sexual assault and for murdered service members like Vanessa Guillen, we need to #PassMJIIPA. https://t.co/f1s1MYMFq1
Wishing a happy, healthy, and bright holiday to everyone celebrating the beginning of Hanukkah tonight. Chag Sameach!

We're one of just a few countries in the world that forces new moms to go back to work just days after giving birth ‚Äî when they're still bleeding, hurting, and trying to care for their newborns. That puts both mom and baby's health at risk. We need #PaidLeaveForAll.

I love seeing all the incredible food you're making for Thanksgiving! Here's the recipe for our berry cobbler if you're interested in giving it a try. Share your favorite Thanksgiving recipe here with me - I can't wait to read them. Happy cooking! https://t.co/I8aEsPIUJ5

Started our Thanksgiving cooking early today with our family's berry cobbler! What are you making this Thanksgiving? https://t.co/XG9OiNOwsH

The CDC now recommends that every adult who got a Pfizer or Moderna COVID-19 vaccine at least six months ago get a booster shot! If you're traveling or gathering for Thanksgiving this week, getting your booster is the best way to protect your friends, family, and loved ones.

Right now, Starbucks partners in Buffalo, NY are in the middle of a historic union vote. I met with workers from @SBWorkersUnited to hear their stories, show my support, and talk about why we need to pass the #PROAct to put an end to union-busting tactics. https://t.co/vvcytJam7a

The Military Justice Improvement and Increasing Prevention Act is supported by a majority of Congress. It is in the Senate NDAA. The only way it doesn't become law is if four men cut it behind closed doors.

Democracy should not be shunned. Survivors deserve justice. #PassMJIIPA https://t.co/sIE9VjwTAv

If you don't have #PaidLeave and you have a family emergency‚Äîmaybe a sick child or a dying parent‚Äîsometimes your only choice is to quit your job. The House just passed the #BuildBackBetter Act with universal, guaranteed #PaidLeave, and I'm going to fight like hell to keep it in. Because working families shouldn't lose their jobs or paychecks to care for a new baby, sick child, or elderly grandparent.

The military justice system failed Vanessa Guillen ‚Äî just like it has failed so many of our service members who have been harassed, assaulted, or murdered. They deserve justice. It's time for the Senate to #PassMJIIPA. https://t.co/19IAH5dXv8

"Paid family leave is not a vacation. We are sending women bleeding, swollen, in stitches, in agony back to work across this country." ‚Äî @liuba4congress

We have to do better for working moms and their babies. We need #PaidLeaveForAll. https://t.co/4SeYjZlu28

Join me and @katieporteroc tonight at 6:30pm ET for a virtual happy hour! We'll be talking about the fight to pass the #BuildBackBetter Agenda and the candidates we're excited to elect next year. Chip in now to join us and help elect more Democratic women! https://t.co/YU2kIGPEiW

My friend @BetoORourke is running for governor of Texas! Beto's been on the front lines of some of our country‚Äôs most important fights ‚Äì from voting rights to reproductive freedom. Chip in now to help him make history next November:

Proud to have you as a cosponsor, @CaptMarkKelly. Let's get this done and #PassMJIIPA. https://t.co/JU5loCKJCF

When kids are seriously ill, too many parents face a horrible choice between taking time to care for their child or losing their job, paycheck, and maybe even the health insurance that covers their care. We need to pass #PaidLeave and get working families the support they need.

Whether you're celebrating the birth of a child or mourning the death of a grandparent, #PaidLeave gives you the time you need to focus on your family without losing your job or your paycheck. And @ossoff and I will never stop fighting for those working families. https://t.co/Y6kCK2htr8

To the Starbucks workers in Buffalo fighting to form a union: I stand with you. Unions level the playing field for working families, and I will keep fighting to pass the #PROAct, defend the right to organize, and strengthen our unions! https://t.co/tmIkKHxsY8

On #VeteransDay, we honor and thank the brave Americans who have served our country. But after twenty years of war, our veterans need more than our gratitude. They need us to fight, every day, to ensure they get the health care and benefits they've earned and deserve.

Staff Sgt. Wesley Black served with honor, fighting for his country, and then fighting for veterans like him who were sick after being exposed to toxic burn pits.

Honor his legacy and his memory. Pass the #BurnPitsAct and get veterans the care they deserve. https://t.co/7n7LAzdiCf

Our families deserve safe, clean drinking water. Thanks to the bipartisan infrastructure bill, we're investing $55 billion to expand access to clean water. That includes $10 billion I fought to include to protect families from toxic, cancer-causing PFAS chemicals.

We know pre-K helps our kids do better in school ‚Äî but in New York, it can cost about $8,600 a year. When we pass the #BuildBackBetterAct and guarantee universal, free pre-K, we'll give all of our kids the chance to thrive, and save families thousands of dollars a year!
Congratulations, @mintimm! We've got a lot of hard work ahead of us, but I look forward to fighting beside you to protect our reproductive freedom. https://t.co/8qbc5ugzdi

Today, we honor and remember the heroes we have lost, send our hearts out to their families and loved ones, and pledge to keep our promises to the heroes who are still with us, and to ensure they get the care they need and deserve. We will #NeverForget their service or sacrifice.

Police officers, firefighters, paramedics, EMTs, construction workers, and transit workers rushed to Ground Zero ‚Äî at first to save lives, then to help recover the bodies of loved ones. Even 20 years later, many are sick and dying after breathing in the toxic smoke at the Pile.

Cab drivers and public transit workers helped get people away from Ground Zero.

Ferries, tug boats, fishing boats, tour boats, and even party boats evacuated half a million people out of Manhattan ‚Äî a rescue operation larger than Dunkirk in World War II.

Pilots, flight attendants, and passengers protected each other and fought the terrorists where they could.

Everyday people helped pull colleagues out of burning buildings, sometimes risking their own lives to save perfect strangers.

Today, many of us can't help but remember the horrors of 9/11. Even twenty years later that shocking day and the terrible weeks that followed are still fresh in my mind.

But we saw the best of humanity too, and I choose to remember the uncommon bravery we saw that day.

John and I fought side by side, and together, we passed the World Trade Center Health Program. Our work isn't done ‚Äî we're still fighting to make sure the program is fully funded. But I know that no matter what, John will be there to hold us accountable.

I met him in 2009 when I joined the Senate. I swore I would never stop fighting for 9/11 first responders. Afterward, John turned to me and said, "Now we're yours." It was humbling and a little intimidating ‚Äî I knew I couldn't fail him.
